title: What can I do here?
excerpt: On the Pearson page, you can:  Access your Pearson content by selecting the
content:
On the Pearson page, you can:

  • Access your Pearson content by selecting the Pearson image or using the Options menu.
  • If available, sync grades from Pearson to your Blackboard course.
  • Access instructor or student help, Pearson Support, or diagnostics to give support for troubleshooting issues.
